snippet: The deal would put more than 100 large banks in Europe under the supervision of the central bank, leaving thousands of smaller banks primarily overseen by national regulators.
abstract: Finance ministers agree to place banks in the euro area under single supervisor; deal puts more than 100 large banks in Europe under the supervision of the European Central Bank, leaving thousands of smaller banks primarily overseen by national regulators.
lead_paragraph: The deal would put more than 100 large banks in Europe under the supervision of the central bank, leaving thousands of smaller banks primarily overseen by national regulators.

headline.seo: European Finance Heads Strive to Reach an Accord on Banking Oversight
headline.main: European Officials Agree to Central Oversight of Banks
headline.print_headline: Finance Ministers Agree to Give Central Bank Oversight of Europe’s Lenders
